Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.characters

Class Joker

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.characters.CharacterCard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.characters.Joker
All Implemented Interfaces:
Card, Serializable
public class Joker extends CharacterCard
Joker class is model representation of the Joker character card.

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init()
      Method init overrides the default init behaviour of the CharacterCard abstract with the Joker logic. The method fills the Joker student list with extracted students from the Bag.
      Overrides:
      init in class CharacterCard

    • activate

      public void activate(Rules rules, Game game)
      Method activate extends the default activate behaviour of the CharacterCard abstract with the Joker logic.
      Overrides:
      activate in class CharacterCard
      Parameters:
      rules - the current rules of the game.
      game - the reference to the current game.

    • deactivate

      public void deactivate(Rules rules, Game game)

      rules - the current rules of the game.
      game - the reference to the current game.

    • swapStudents

      public void swapStudents(Color studentToPick, Color studentToPut) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Method swapStudents swaps students from the card's student map.
      Parameters:
      studentToPick - the student you pick from the card
      studentToPut - the student you put on the card
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

      public int getSwappedStudents()
      Method getSwappedStudents returns the number of students currently swapped.

      public List<Color> getStudents()
      Method getStudents overrides the default behaviour of the CharacterCard abstract.
      Overrides:
      getStudents in class CharacterCard
      Returns:
